lines.text: [Knotweed is clearly impressed with the bold, if camp, Merry Men of Sherwwod Forest]
Aren't they magnificent. You know Lurkalot I must confess I'm bent on joining them.
I've got a feeling you'll have to be.
[Lurkalot is reciting the final part of the movies opening prologue]
And so they made me a serf, a servant. And they named me Lurklalot. Because I do.
[Lurkalot is warning Lady Ashfordel of the severity of Sir Braggart's intentions towards Lady Lobelia]
Besides Sir Braggart will be gross mispleased when he finds out your daughter Lobelia is not Chaste. Well she is. But she falls down a lot. Even now she lies with the woodman.
That's not true. He merely went up to stoke her fire.
Well. That's one way of putting it.
[Lurkalot is making up some potion in his Laboratory as he speaks to the naive, mentally deficient Knot Weed De Custard]

[pointing]
What's that?
That is my latest batch of home made Aphrodisiac.
Well. What's that?
Aphrodisiac? Well it you know. Gets you going.
Going where?
Look. This is for people you see who want to, but they can't. And they take some of this you see, and they can. Like Rattlesnakes.
Do What?

[exasperated]
Rattle.

[performing the film's title song]
Give me a modern man who knows how it has to be / Not some old miser who's guarding my chastity / Treating his woman as though she were some kind of chattel / It's unnatural / Give me a born true fighter who'll willingly tilt for me / Not some poor flower who'll suddenly wilt when he's hard / Pressed, right in the thick of the battle / Oh for a knight for my nights! / Oh for a knight for my nights! /

[Spotting Knotweed among the Merry Men]
You're not one of them are you?
If he's not, he soon will be!
Unclean!
[Addressing the camera]
Well let's face it - it has been up to now!

[Indicating the 'Gonepowder' bomb to Sir Coward]
Reminds me of the wife. She said to me 'When I go, I want to be cremated'. I said get your wimple off, we'll go round now!

[to Sir Coward]
This doesn't sound like you at all!

[Leans closer to Sir Coward, and pulls a hookah from under the cloak]
I thought so! He's been smoking this all the way home!
